ComicInfo.Title: Pity the Moose; Game Time; A Night Out with Tom; Making a Fortune
ComicInfo.Summary:
Pity the Moose: When Tom goes moose hunting, Jerry and Tuffy act to save the moose.
Game Time: Tom wants to just lie in his hammock, while Jerry and Tuffy want to play outdoor games.
A Night Out with Tom: Tom wants a night out without Jerry and Tuffy. Jerry and Tuffy disagree.
Making a Fortune: Tom hears Jerry and Tuffy’s bathtub singing, and tries to get them a recording contract. The president of the recording company just doesn’t like mice, forcing Tom into inventive ways to secure an audition.
